title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

title: Contributing to czso
text: Small typos grammatical errors documentation may edited directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. YES: edit roxygen comment .R file R/. : edit .Rd file man/.

title: Contributing to czso
text: make substantial pull request, always file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s problem. ’ve found bug, create associated issue illustrate bug minimal reprex.

title: Contributing to czso
text: recommend create Git branch pull request (PR). Look Travis AppVeyor build status making changes. README contain badges continuous integration services used package. New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat. Contributions test cases included easier accept. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md current development version header describing changes made followed GitHub username, links relevant issue(s)/PR(s).

what: An R package for using data from the Czech Statisical Office
title: An R package for using data from the Czech Statisical Office
text: goal czso provide direct, programmatic, hassle-free access R open data provided Czech Statistical Office (CZSO). done providing direct access R catalogue open CZSO datasets, eliminating hassle data discovery. Normally done done CZSO’s product catalogue unfortunately bit clunky, data.gov.cz, natural starting point many. providing function load specific dataset R directly CZSO’s datastore, eliminating friction copying URL, downloading, unzipping etc. Additionally, package provides access metadata datasets codelists (číselníky) special case datasets listed catalogue.

title: An R package for using data from the Czech Statisical Office
text: can install package CRAN: can install latest -development release github : latest version : also keep binaries drat repo, can access

title: An R package for using data from the Czech Statisical Office
text: Say looking dataset whose title refers wages (mzda/mzdy): First, retrieve list available CZSO datasets: Now search terms interest dataset titles: also search descriptions keywords also retrieved catalogue. can see dataset_id required dataset - now use get dataset: can retrieve schema dataset: download documentation PDF: interested linking data different data, might need NUTS codes regions. Seeing lines regional breakdown list uzemi_cis "100", can get codelist (číselník): need bit manual work join codelist onto data.
code: library(czso) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(stringr))  catalogue <- czso_get_catalogue() catalogue %>%    filter(str_detect(title, "[Mm]zd[ay]")) %>%    select(dataset_id, title, description) #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   dataset_id title                                                   description #>   <chr>      <chr>                                                   <chr>       #> 1 110080     Průměrná hrubá měsíční mzda a medián mezd v krajích     Datová sad… #> 2 110079     Zaměstnanci a průměrné hrubé měsíční mzdy podle odvětví Datová sad… czso_get_table("110080") #> # A tibble: 1,080 × 14 #>    idhod  hodnota stapro_kod SPKVANTIL_cis SPKVANTIL_kod POHLAVI_cis POHLAVI_kod #>    <chr>    <dbl> <chr>      <chr>         <chr>         <chr>       <chr>       #>  1 73662…   21782 5958       7636          Q5            <NA>        <NA>        #>  2 73662…   25625 5958       <NA>          <NA>          <NA>        <NA>        #>  3 73662…   28431 5958       <NA>          <NA>          102         1           #>  4 73662…   22133 5958       <NA>          <NA>          102         2           #>  5 73662…   23533 5958       7636          Q5            102         1           #>  6 73662…   19731 5958       7636          Q5            102         2           #>  7 74595…   26033 5958       <NA>          <NA>          <NA>        <NA>        #>  8 74595…   28873 5958       <NA>          <NA>          102         1           #>  9 74595…   22496 5958       <NA>          <NA>          102         2           #> 10 74595…   21997 5958       7636          Q5            <NA>        <NA>        #> # ℹ 1,070 more rows #> # ℹ 7 more variables: rok <int>, uzemi_cis <chr>, uzemi_kod <chr>, #> #   STAPRO_TXT <chr>, uzemi_txt <chr>, SPKVANTIL_txt <chr>, POHLAVI_txt <chr> czso_get_table_schema("110080") #> # A tibble: 14 × 5 #>    name          titles        `dc:description`                required datatype #>    <chr>         <chr>         <chr>                           <lgl>    <chr>    #>  1 idhod         idhod         "unikátní identifikátor údaje … TRUE     string   #>  2 hodnota       hodnota       "zjištěná hodnota"              TRUE     number   #>  3 stapro_kod    stapro_kod    "kód statistické proměnné ze s… TRUE     string   #>  4 spkvantil_cis spkvantil_cis "kód číselníku pro kvantil"     TRUE     string   #>  5 spkvantil_kod spkvantil_kod "kód položky z číselníku pro k… TRUE     string   #>  6 pohlavi_cis   pohlavi_cis   "kód číselníku pro pohlaví"     TRUE     string   #>  7 pohlavi_kod   pohlavi_kod   "kód položky číselníku pro poh… TRUE     string   #>  8 rok           rok           "rok referenčního období ve fo… TRUE     number   #>  9 uzemi_cis     uzemi_cis     "kód číselníku pro referenční … TRUE     string   #> 10 uzemi_kod     uzemi_kod     "kód položky číselníku pro ref… TRUE     string   #> 11 uzemi_txt     uzemi_txt     "text položky z číselníku pro … TRUE     string   #> 12 stapro_txt    stapro_txt    "text statistické proměnné"     TRUE     string   #> 13 spkvantil_txt spkvantil_txt "text položky číselníku pro kv… TRUE     string   #> 14 pohlavi_txt   pohlavi_txt   "text položky číselníku pro po… TRUE     string czso_get_dataset_doc("110080", action = "download", format = "pdf") #> ✔ Downloaded <https://www.czso.cz/documents/62353418/171419376/110080-22dds.pdf> to '110080-22dds.pdf' czso_get_codelist(100) #> # title: Filter the catalogue using a set of keywords — czso_filter_catalogue
Filter the catalogue using a set of keywords — czso_filter_catalogue
text: catalogue catalogue returned czso_get_catalogue() search_terms #' regex pattern (incl. plain text), vector regex patterns, filter catalogue . case-insensitive filter performed title, description keywords. search returns catalogue entries patterns matched anywhere within title, description keywords.

title: Filter the catalogue using a set of keywords — czso_filter_catalogue
text: tibble filtered catalogue.

title: Filter the catalogue using a set of keywords — czso_filter_catalogue
code: ctlg <- czso_get_catalogue() czso_filter_catalogue(ctlg, search_terms = c("kraj", "me?zd")) #> # A tibble: 1 × 12 #>   dataset_iri     dataset_id title provider description spatial modified   page  #>   <chr>           <chr>      <chr> <chr>    <chr>       <chr>   <date>     <chr> #> 1 https://vdb.cz… 110080     Prům… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2025-05-23 http… #> # what: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
title: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
text: Retrieves list CZSO's open datasets available Czech Open data catalogue.

title: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
text: search_terms regex pattern, vector regex patterns, filter catalogue . case-insensitive filter performed title, description keywords. search returns catalogue entries patterns matched anywhere within title, description keywords.

title: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
text: data frame details CZSO datasets available Czech National Open Data Catalogue. columns fairly well described names, except: columns contain IRIs instead human readable text; still can deduce content IRI. spatial columns contains IRI ending pattern {unit_type}/{unit_code}. unit_type denotes unit data covers (scope/domain granularity) second identifies unit covered. unit_type usually "stat" "state" unit_code 1. unit_type can also "KR" region "OB" municipality, "OK" district. case, unit_code code unit. page points documentation, .e. methodology notes dataset.

title: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
text: Pass string dataset_id column get_czso_table(). dataset_iri unique identifier dataset national catalogue also URL containing metadata dataset.

title: Get catalogue of open CZSO datasets — czso_get_catalogue
code: # \donttest{ czso_get_catalogue() #> # A tibble: 1,030 × 12 #>    dataset_iri    dataset_id title provider description spatial modified   page  #>    <chr>          <chr>      <chr> <chr>    <chr>       <chr>   <date>     <chr> #>  1 https://vdb.c… 170242     Bila… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  2 https://vdb.c… 290038r05  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  3 https://vdb.c… 290038r06  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  4 https://vdb.c… 290038r07  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  5 https://vdb.c… 290038r08  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  6 https://vdb.c… 290038r09  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  7 https://vdb.c… 290038r10  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  8 https://vdb.c… 290038r11  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #>  9 https://vdb.c… 290038r12  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #> 10 https://vdb.c… 290038r13  Cizi… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2024-06-28 http… #> # ℹ 1,020 more rows #> # ℹ 4 more variables: periodicity <chr>, start <date>, end <date>, #> #   keywords_all <chr> czso_get_catalogue(search_terms = c("kraj", "me?zd")) #> # A tibble: 1 × 12 #>   dataset_iri     dataset_id title provider description spatial modified   page  #>   <chr>           <chr>      <chr> <chr>    <chr>       <chr>   <date>     <chr> #> 1 https://vdb.cz… 110080     Prům… Český s… Datová sad… https:… 2025-05-23 http… #> # ℹ 4 more variables: periodicity <chr>, start <date>, end <date>, #> #   keywords_all <chr> # }

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: Downloads codelist (registry table) returns tibble. Codelists canonical lists entities, names IDs. See Details. Codelists included catalogue can retrieved using czso_get_catalogue(). IDs start "cis" followed two- three-digit number.

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
code: czso_get_codelist(   codelist_id,   language = c("cs", "en"),   dest_dir = NULL,   resource_num = NULL,   force_redownload = FALSE )

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: codelist_id character numeric length 1 2; ID codelist download. See Details. language language, either "cs" (default) "en", available codelists. dest_dir character. Directory downloaded files stored. left unset, use czso.dest_dir option option set, tempdir() otherwise. created exist. resource_num integer, order resource. override need different format. force_redownload whether download even cached local file available.

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: tibble columns except dates kept character. See Details columns.

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: Codelists canonical registries entities: things, statistical areas aggregates, concepts, categorisations. codelist typically contains IDs names entities fitting certain category. commonly used codelists geographical, e.g. lists regions municipalities. world CZSO, codelist numeric ID two four digits. can pass number function (even string), can pass dataset ID found catalogue; latter form e.g. "cisNN".

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: CZSO data store also holds tables describing relations codelists. especially useful spatial hierarchies (e.g. towns belong region), converting categorisations (e.g. two different sets IDs regions.) can pass vector two IDs (numeric character) relational table two exists, returned. (work, try flipping around). equivalent dataset ID, found catalogue, "cisXXvazYY".

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist
text: single-codelist files, see commonly included columns. relational tables, see column twice, time suffix 1 2. AKRCIS: codelist abbreviation KODCIS: codelist ID CHODNOTA: entity ID TEXT: entity name ZKRTEXT: entity name abbreviated ADMPLOD: valid ADMNEPO: invalid KOD_RUIAN: geographical entites, RUIAN code (different master registry run geodesists) CZNUTS: geographical entities, NUTS code

title: Get CZSO codelist (registry / číselník) — czso_get_codelist

what: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
text: Retrieves URL/downloads file containing documentation dataset, required format.

title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
code: czso_get_dataset_doc(   dataset_id,   action = c("return", "open", "download"),   destfile = NULL,   format = c("html", "pdf", "word") )

title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
text: dataset_id Dataset ID action Whether return URL (default), download file, open URL default web browser. destfile save file. used action = download. format file format access: html (default), pdf, word.

title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
text: action = download, path downloaded file; file URL otherwise.

title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
text: document functions provides access contains methodological background specified dataset identified schema field list returned czso_get_dataset_metadata().

title: Get documentation for CZSO dataset — czso_get_dataset_doc
Get dataset metadata — czso_get_dataset_metadata
text: Get metadata CZSO API, can somewhat detailed/readable provided dataset's entry output czso_get_dataset().

title: Get dataset metadata — czso_get_dataset_metadata
text: dataset_id Dataset ID

title: Get dataset metadata — czso_get_dataset_metadata
text: list elements named English, names mostly self-explanatory. contents dates; title, description, notes tags exist Czech far know. fields merit explanation: resources: list files available download dataset frequency: see https://project-open-data.cio.gov/iso8601_guidance/ key ruian_type: type spatial unit data covers (spatial domain/extent/scope, granularity). ST means "state" (almost always case), "KR" means region (kraj), "OK" district (okres), "OB" municipality (obec); "RS" cohesion region (region soudržnosti, larger region) ruian_code: code unit data covers per RUIAN taxonomy schema points documentation describedBy points technical schema JSON XML.

title: Get dataset metadata — czso_get_dataset_metadata
text: far can tell way get metadata English, though key datasets, codelists, English-language documentation. See czso_get_table() access English-language codelists (registers).

what: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: Downloads reads dataset identified dataset_id. Unzips necessary, loads CSV files, otherwise returns path downloaded file. Converts types columns known, e.g. value columns numeric.

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
code: czso_get_table(   dataset_id,   dest_dir = NULL,   force_redownload = FALSE,   resource_num = 1 )

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: dataset_id character. Found czso_id column data frame returned get_catalogue(). dest_dir character. Directory downloaded files stored. left unset, use czso.dest_dir option option set, tempdir() otherwise. created exist. force_redownload integer. Whether redownload data source file even already cached. Defaults FALSE. resource_num integer. Order resource resource list given dataset. Defaults 1, normal value CZSO datasets.

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: tibble, vector file paths file CSV multiple files dataset. See Details columns contained tibble

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: CZSO provides open data tidy data, row contains one value hodnota column remaining columns give details value defined. See "Included columns" work.

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: schema dataset yet used, columns may mistyped default returned character vectors.

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: range columns present output varies one dataset another, package attempt provide English-language names known subset, result jumble Czenglish. Instead, guide common column names encounter: idhod: unique ID value CZSO database. allow link (meta)data far know, provide unique identification need . hodnota: value. stapro_kod: code statistic/indicator/variable listed. SMS UKAZ register (https://www.czso.cz/csu/czso/statistical-variables-indicators); one Czech-English documentation - access clicking UK flag top right. can also get data table definitions, search "statistické proměnné" title field catalogue. Last checked, ID table "990124-17". rok denotes year YYYY. ctvrtleti denotes quarter available. metadata come form {variable}_[txt|cis|kod]. _txt column holds Czech text name category. _cis column holds ID codelist (register) need decode code _kod. English codelists http://apl.czso.cz/iSMS/en/cislist.jsp, Czech ones http://apl.czso.cz/iSMS/cs/cislist.jsp. can find Czech-language codelists catalogue retrieved czso_get_catalogue(), IDs begin "cis" followed number; English ones can also retrieved link using permalink URL. conveniently, can use czso_get_codelist() function retrieve codelist. Units denoted separate column. helper common breakdowns associated columns: uzemi: territory vek: age pohlavi: gender NAs "breakdown" columns (e.g. gender age) denote total.

title: Retrieve and read dataset from CZSO — czso_get_table
text: use harvesting datasets CZSO en masse.

title: Get CZSO table schema — czso_get_table_schema
text: Retrieves parses schema table identified dataset_id resource_num.

title: Get CZSO table schema — czso_get_table_schema
text: dataset_id Dataset ID resource_num Resource number, typically 1 CZSO (default)

title: Get CZSO table schema — czso_get_table_schema
text: tibble description table columns, following items: name: column name. titles: usually duplicate name dc:description: Czech-language description column required: whether column required datatatype: data type column; either "number" "string"

title: Get CZSO table schema — czso_get_table_schema
text: Currently handles JSON schema files CSV files. schema different format, error returned pointing user URL file.

title: Get CZSO table schema — czso_get_table_schema
code: # \donttest{ czso_get_table_schema("110080") #> # A tibble: 14 × 5 #>    name          titles        `dc:description`                required datatype #>    <chr>         <chr>         <chr>                           <lgl>    <chr>    #>  1 idhod         idhod         "unikátní identifikátor údaje … TRUE     string   #>  2 hodnota       hodnota       "zjištěná hodnota"              TRUE     number   #>  3 stapro_kod    stapro_kod    "kód statistické proměnné ze s… TRUE     string   #>  4 spkvantil_cis spkvantil_cis "kód číselníku pro kvantil"     TRUE     string   #>  5 spkvantil_kod spkvantil_kod "kód položky z číselníku pro k… TRUE     string   #>  6 pohlavi_cis   pohlavi_cis   "kód číselníku pro pohlaví"     TRUE     string   #>  7 pohlavi_kod   pohlavi_kod   "kód položky číselníku pro poh… TRUE     string   #>  8 rok           rok           "rok referenčního období ve fo… TRUE     number   #>  9 uzemi_cis     uzemi_cis     "kód číselníku pro referenční … TRUE     string   #> 10 uzemi_kod     uzemi_kod     "kód položky číselníku pro ref… TRUE     string   #> 11 uzemi_txt     uzemi_txt     "text položky z číselníku pro … TRUE     string   #> 12 stapro_txt    stapro_txt    "text statistické proměnné"     TRUE     string   #> 13 spkvantil_txt spkvantil_txt "text položky číselníku pro kv… TRUE     string   #> 14 pohlavi_txt   pohlavi_txt   "text položky číselníku pro po… TRUE     string   # }

title: {czso} on MacOS Monterey — monterey
text: Explanation extra setup steps needed use {czso} MacOS Monterey

title: {czso} on MacOS Monterey — monterey
text: early versions MacOS Monterey ship old version Libre SSL. causes otherwise rare bug ` certificates CZSO servers decrypted, R communicate server. R relies default system SSL library, fact affects even curl system command line. solution R put CURL_SSL_BACKEND=SecureTransport .Renviron. (forget add newline last line file). Setting anywhere R startup may work, hence .Renviron solution recommended. can also put system environent e.g. setting system variable .profile file. issue longer exists MacOS Monterey 12.3 Beta, presumably also exist Monterey 12.3.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: czso 0.4.3
text: update URL tagline csu.gov.cz re-release CZSO domain certificate caused CRAN removal

title: czso 0.4.2
text: CRAN release: 2025-06-21 fix issue czso_get_table_schema() detecting JSON format schema URL make less use stringi dependency

title: czso 0.4.1
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-20 add new function czso_filter_catalogue() provides ergonomic search catalogue, searching relevant fields catalogue union search terms. related , czso_get_catalogue() new search_terms parameter, filters catalogue inline.

title: czso 0.4.0
text: move new CZSO API remove deprecated functions (exported functions starting czso_)

title: czso 0.3.12
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-03 fix link 302 code CRAN checks

title: czso 0.3.11
text: fix documentation avoid CRAN NOTEs handle invalid JSON old CZSO API hard-deprecate old functions; removed next version

title: czso 0.3.10
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-01 update Roxygen2 version rebuild documentation handle CRAN validation HTML manual

title: czso 0.3.9
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-09 removed usethis dependency; messages now done {cli} removed stringr dependency readded stringi dependency

title: czso 0.3.8
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-27 MacOS Monterey, native curl reach https://www.czso.cz/, making impossible R reach . Monterey machines default curl configuration, functions accessing server fail message instructing user set option .Renviron resolve issue. temporary situation bug fixed MacOS fix found R require user set environment variables.

title: czso 0.3.7
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-09 remove unnecessary {stringi} dependency

title: czso 0.3.6
text: update tests fix CRAN failure due unreachable provider server fixed minor bug multi-file archives handled

title: czso 0.3.5
text: CRAN release: 2021-09-22 NOTE: unexpected change National Open Data Catalogue caused problems dataset IDs returned czso_get_catalogue(). release provides temporary fix based patch API kindly provided Czech Statistical Office. Future releases handle change robust way final form catalogue API determined CZSO.

what: Fixes to code that is currently not used but may be again as the dust settles:
title: czso 0.3.5
text: fix SPARQL query return datasets, incl. 2 showing compared official data catalogue web interface return label, rather IRI, temporal resolution, output czso_get_catalogue()

title: czso 0.3.4
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-01 minor fixes CRAN checks

title: czso 0.3.3
text: update SPARQL query reflect new version provider’s data catalogue fix bug czso_get_table() (@jlacko) add link README Awesome Official statistics list

title: czso 0.3.2
text: CRAN release: 2020-10-22 minor README edit CRAN resubmission

title: czso 0.3.1
text: minor README edits CRAN resubmission

title: czso 0.3.0
text: codelists (číselníky) can now retrieved czso_get_codelist(). includes hierarchies codelist items, English versions available

title: czso 0.3.0
text: new dest_dir parameter czso_get_[table|codelist]() allows store downloaded data files custom location. location can set script user (.Rprofile) level setting czso.dest_dir option. improved UI: informative better formatted messages, hints reminders common mishaps documentation added czso_get_table() get definitions indicators variables used CZSO. date-type columns parsed typed correctly

title: czso 0.3.0
text: deprecated functions longer used internally encoding guess longer breaks Linux (@jlacko)

what: Deprecations of functions with old names
title: czso 0.3.0
text: functions named get_czso_* now deprecated emit warning used. Use czso_*() instead.

title: czso 0.2.3
text: CRAN release: 2020-04-07

title: czso 0.2.3
text: Description field DESCRIPTION now contains link data provider documentation functions now provide detail functions return

title: czso 0.2.3
text: czso_get_table_schema() now throws error non-JSON schema includes URL error message czso_get_table() now writes files read right extension czso_get_dataset_doc() returns URL invisibly action "open"

title: czso 0.2.2
text: add cran-comments.md fixed dplyr-related CHECK NOTE updated LICENSE CRAN update URL README

title: czso 0.2.2
text: functions accessing CZSO data now return helpful error dataset found fixed deprecation warnings display correct package name added helpful error message access internet spelling corrections better error output CZSO server returns error

title: czso 0.2.1
text: user-facing functions now czso_* avoid conflicts aid discovery via auto-complete. Original functions soft-deprecated.

title: czso 0.2.1
text: improvements documentation added code conduct contributing guide

title: czso 0.2.0
text: new get_dataset_doc() function accessing documentation new get_table_schema() function retrieving table schema exported get_dataset_metadata() function accessing detailed metadata

title: czso 0.1.5
text: get_czso_catalogue() now much faster uses open data catalogue’s API instead downloading huge CSV list datasets. less flexible allow direct filtering. handle encoding older datasets, may UTF-8

title: czso 0.1.4
text: relaxed stringi version requirement make Win build work

title: czso 0.1.3
text: exported functions renamed get_czso_catalogue() get_czso_table() avoid clashes packages; original functions soft-deprecated removed future versions.

title: czso 0.1.3
text: fix bug get_czso_catalogue() empty tibble returned source CSV read incorrectly (due vroom handling newlines inside fields)

title: czso 0.1.2
text: add per-session caching get_catalogue() get_table(), incl. new force_redownload parameter

title: czso 0.1.1
text: fixed error loading zipped files get_table()

title: czso 0.1.0
text: first version functioning core workflow

title: czso 0.0.0.9000
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
